item.title: Stardew Valley: 7 Best Food For Fishing
item.description:
Summary

  • Seafoam Pudding offers the highest fishing level boost of +4 and is great for catching challenging fish.
  • Lobster Bisque provides a +3 fishing boost with +50 max energy and is simple to make.
  • Fish Stew has a long duration and offers a +3 fishing buff, making it useful for a whole day.

Fishing in Stardew Valley tends to divide players: some love it, while others would rather take on the Skull Cavern without a weapon. But regardless of opinion, fishing does get easier with experience, and food can help speed up the process.

The following items are listed based on their effect on fishing level, taking into account both how long they last and how easy they are to acquire. Items not included on this list are Chowder and Trout Soup , which while providing +1 fishing, are not the most effective options for improving catches.

1 Seafoam Pudding

The Highest Boost To Fishing Level

  • Buff(s): Fishing +4
  • Duration: 3m 30s
  • Ingredients: 1 Flounder , 1 Midnight Carp , 1 Squid Ink

Seafoam Pudding has the largest fishing level boost, with a +4 increase. It is highly effective for catching more challenging fish, such as the Legendary Fish, and when paired with a good tackle, it can greatly ease the fishing process.

The recipe for Seafoam Pudding is sent to the player via mail once they achieve level 9 fishing, though it can be won or purchased before then elsewhere. One Seafoam Pudding can be purchased at The Dance of the Moonlight Jellies for 5,000g, and one can randomly appear at the Traveling Merchant for 900-1,500g. Furthermore, players can win the dish as an iridium-tier prize at SquidFest on both days or be gifted one by a pet turtle with maximum friendship.

2 Lobster Bisque

Offers An Increase To Max Energy

  • Buff(s): +3 Fishing, +50 Max Energy
  • Duration: 16m 47s
  • Ingredients: 1 Lobster , 1 Milk

Lobster Bisque has a long duration and is fairly simple to make, making it one of the best options for food to use while fishing. The recipe can be acquired either from reaching 9 hearts with Willy or from the Queen of Sauce on Winter 14 of year 2.

It can randomly appear in the Traveling Cart for 615-1,025g or can be found inside a Mystery Box . Also, five Lobster Bisques can be purchased from Gus ' shop at the Desert Festival for 30 Calico Egg each, which is worth stocking up on if players wish to tackle some of Willy's fishing challenges at the festival.

3 Fish Stew

A Strong Boost With Long Duration

  • Buff(s): +3 Fishing
  • Duration: 16m 47s
  • Ingredients: 1 Crayfish , 1 Mussel , 1 Periwinkle , 1 Tomato

The recipe for Fish Stew can be accessed once players have reached 7 hearts with Willy , but the dish itself is available in other ways. Like many other dishes, one can randomly appear in the Traveling Cart for 525-1,000g.

Fish Stew has a 7% chance of appearing in a Golden Fishing Treasure Chest and can also be found inside a Mystery Box when opened at Clint 's shop. An average day in Stardew Valley lasts around 12 minutes, so eating this dish at the beginning of the day allows players to experience the buff for the whole 20 in-game hours.

4 Dish O' The Sea

Easy To Acquire And Simple To Make

  • Buff(s): +3 Fishing
  • Duration: 5m 35s
  • Ingredients: 2 Sardine , 1 Hashbrowns

Dish O' The Sea is one of the easiest recipes to make on this list, as Sardines can be caught at the beach in Spring, Fall, and Winter, and Hashbrowns only require 1 Potato and 1 Oil . Additionally, the recipe can be obtained fairly early in the game, as it becomes available at fishing level 3.

The dish can be obtained in several ways. Five can appear in the Skull Cavern treasure room and are rewarded for completing the Specialty Fish Bundle in the Community Center (or the Master Fisher's Bundle/Quality Fish Bundle in the remixed version). Both Mystery Box and Golden Mystery Box have a chance to hold two Dish O' The Sea, with one guaranteed as the silver tier reward at SquidFest.

5 Escargot

A Long Duration And A Simple Recipe

  • Buff(s): +2 Fishing
  • Duration: 16m 47s
  • Ingredients: 1 Snail , 1 Garlic

Escargot is not as easy to find as Dish O' The Sea, as it can only be obtained in two ways without cooking. One option is inside a regular Mystery Box , and the other is available for 30 Calico Egg s at Gus ' shop during the Desert Festival.

Like many dishes on this list, Willy will send this recipe via mail, once the player has reached 5 hearts with him. The recipe has only two ingredients, making it fairly simple to prepare around mid-game once the Crab Pot has been unlocked.

6 Fish Taco

A Good Boost For Seven Minutes

  • Buff(s): +2 Fishing
  • Duration: 7m
  • Ingredients: 1 Tuna , 1 Tortilla , 1 Red Cabbage , 1 Mayonnaise

Fish Taco has quite a complex recipe, including four ingredients with one only available from Summer, Year 2. The recipe is sent via mail from Linus at 7 hearts, but the dish is fairly easy to acquire before then.

A Fish Taco can be found randomly in Gus ' rotating stock at the Saloon for 1,000g, in Krobus ' shop on Saturdays for 50-500g, and in the Traveling Cart for 1,500-2,500g. It also has a 7% chance of appearing in Golden Fishing Treasure Chests.

7 Shrimp Cocktail

Offers A Boost To Both Fishing And Luck

  • Buff(s): +1 Fishing, +1 Luck
  • Duration: 10m 2s
  • Ingredients: 1 Tomato , 1 Shrimp , 1 Wild Horseradish

Shrimp Cocktail becomes available on Winter 28 of Year 2, so it takes some time to acquire. However, the luck and fishing buffs make it a fantastic recipe, as by that point, players typically have a high enough fishing level that the +1 boost is all they need. There are only two ways to obtain the recipe in Stardew Valley other than cooking it, which is either via a Golden Fishing Treasure Chest or a Mystery Box .

item.title: Helldivers 2: How to Get the TR-117 Alpha Commander Armor Set
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get the TR-117 Alpha Commander Armor Set in Helldivers 2
  • Is the Alpha Commander Set Worth It?

Helldivers 2 offers plenty of customization options, making it essential for die-hard fans to collect every piece of gear. The TR-117 Alpha Commander armor set holds a special place in this regard. The highly coveted armor has a storied past, being one of the most exclusive armor sets to get in Helldivers 2 . Whether for style, stats, or sheer completionist pride, you have a golden opportunity to add the prized armor set to your collection, and that too for free.

How to Get the TR-117 Alpha Commander Armor Set in Helldivers 2

The TR-117 Alpha Commander armor set was a limited-time Twitch drop from watching Helldivers 2 streams during the launch month. The only way to get the coveted armor set afterward was to buy their unredeemed Twitch codes from eBay sellers at exorbitant prices. However, thanks to a new partnership with The Game Awards, the Alpha Commander armor set is shedding its exclusive nature for the Helldivers 2 community.

In celebration of Helldivers 2 winning the "Best Ongoing Game" category at The Game Awards 2024, the TR-117 Alpha Commander armor set is now available to all Steam players as a free DLC . This free offer will last seven days and expire on December 19, 2024 , after which the armor set will be unlocked globally for all platforms at a fixed price

If you want to spread democracy in style earlier than the rest, and that too for free, here is how to claim the highly prestigious Alpha Commander set:

  • Open the Helldivers 2 store page on Steam.
  • Check its DLC page.
  • Add the TR-117 Alpha Commander Set to your account.
  • Launch the game and visit the Armory to equip your new armor.
  • You can also just visit the TGA Steam page and click on the free item.

Helldivers 2 remains blocked in several countries following the PSN account-linking controversy . However, players from the blocked regions can still claim the Alpha Commander set as long as they bought the game before Sony pushed the PSN requirement.

Is the Alpha Commander Set Worth It?

Even after losing its exclusivity, the Alpha Commander armor set remains a worthy addition to any Armory in Helldivers 2 .

The TR-117 Alpha Commander is a medium armor set featuring the Med-Kit armor passive that allows you to carry two additional Stims and increases the Stim effect by another 2 seconds. Considering how the new Illuminate enemies pack quite a punch, the extra Stims (and extra armor stats) are definitely worth having on any mission.

The CM-14 Physician set is a replica of the TR-117 Alpha Commander set with a different color scheme.

Halo fans will especially want the Alpha Commander set because of its obvious reference to Master Chief and his MJOLNIR armor. The armor design and color, the reference to John-117, and how Master Chief served as a ranking "Commander" make this a special inclusion in the Helldivers 2 world.

item.title: GTA Online: Best New Cars Added In Agents Of Sabotage
item.description:
Summary

  • Dinka Chavos V6 is a new sedan with good handling, but not the best in its class for $1.42 mil.
  • Dinka Jester RR Widebody lacks customization and isn't worth $2.29 mil; skip if you have the regular version.
  • Vapid Caracara Pursuit is a powerful police vehicle with customization options for $5.33-$4.00 mil.

The winter DLC for GTA Online, Agents Of Sabotage , has brought a lot of new content for players to dive into. Players got a new business, Darnell Bros. Garment Factory, and finally, exciting upgrades to the Terrorbyte. However, ever since the trailer for the DLC was released, players have been excited about the new vehicles coming to the game.

Rockstar has released a decent number of vehicles on day one of the DLC, with a several more to follow. Here are the best vehicles from the Agents of Sabotage DLC that players can buy.

5 Dinka Chavos V6

Price: $1,420,000

Based On

Ninth generation Honda Accord

Where To Buy

Southern San Andreas Super Autos

Top Speed

115.50 mph

The Dinka Chavos V6 is a new Sedan class in GTA Online. It is rear-wheel drive, which is unique for Dinka vehicles. Thus, it handles pretty well. In addition, it has decent launch and acceleration, although it's nothing fancy or Sedan class racing meta-shaking. It is below par compared to the faster sedans such as Benefactor Schafter V12, Lampadati Cenquemila, etc.

The Chavos V6 has a lot of great customization options, and players can make theirs unique. As value for money goes, it is not the best vehicle buy that players can go for and can easily be sidelined. However, if they are flush with money and want to get a new sedan to cruise around with friends, players should definitely try the Chavos V6.

4 Dinka Jester RR Widebody

Price: $2,290,000

Based On

Customized Toyota Supra (A90) "Dragon Edit Team"

Where To Buy

Legendary Motorsport

Top Speed

118.25 mph

The Dinka Jester RR Widebody is the regular Jester RR added with the Tuners DLC, but with a widebody kit. When players first saw this vehicle in the trailer, they were speculating if the regular Jester RR was getting a Benny's upgrade to put on a widebody kit, or if it was going to be a whole new vehicle, and were seemingly ok with either option. However, they now wish they had gotten the former option. The Jester RR Widebody has absolutely no customization.

Other than performance upgrades, players can only change this vehicle's color. On top of that, the regular Jester RR has a drift tuning upgrade available. The Widebody version, which should ideally have this upgrade as well, also misses on this feature. As for performance, it can feel like a slight improvement to the Jester RR, but it is barely noticeable. Therefore, fans can easily skip this vehicle if they have the regular Jester RR and wait until Rockstar Games adds drift tuning to justify the Widebody version's steep price.

3 Vapid Caracara Pursuit

Price: $5,335,000 - $4,001,250 (Trade price)

Based On

Ford F-150

Where To Buy

Warstock Cache & Carry

Top Speed

103.25 mph

The Caracara Pursuit is the latest addition to the police vehicles that the Rockstar Games have been adding to GTA Online since the Chop Shop DLC. It is the police version of the existing Vapid Caracara 4x4, which is a powerful off-road vehicle. It has great top speed and acceleration for what it is, thanks to it being an all-wheel drive vehicle.

Caracara Pursuit has a ton of customization options. Players can completely kit it out with police equipment such as push bars, emergency lights, etc., and give it an aggressive look. For players who like to roleplay in GTA Online, they can add this monstrous cop car in their garage.

2 Canis Terminus Patrol

Price: $5,125,000 - $3,843,750 (Trade price)

Based On

Jeep Wrangler Rubicon (JL)

Where To Buy

Warstock Cache & Carry

Top Speed

118.9 mph

The Terminus Patrol is another cop car added with the Agent Of Sabotage DLC. As the name suggests, it is based on the Canis Terminus, the best off-road vehicle in the game. There is nothing that this vehicle cannot do, and getting a police version is an absolute treat. The Terminus Patrol only has decent options for customization as far as a cop car goes, but that's not a big issue.

As for performance goes, it is among the top 3 best cop cars currently available in GTA Online. The one major downside of this vehicle is that, unlike the regular Terminus, the Patrol version doesn't have an armor-plating option for the Imani Tech. Players can only add the missile lock-on jammer to the Terminus Patrol, just like other vehicles from this DLC. Still, players have been waiting for a cop Jeep and a better off-road vehicle to put on the Park Ranger livery, and the Terminus Patrol fills that role.

1 Bravado Banshee GTS

Price: $1,989,500

Based On

Dodge Viper GTS (VX)

Where To Buy

Legendary Motorsport

Top Speed

138.00 mph

Undisputably, the best car to get from the Agents of Sabotage DLC is the Bravado Banshee GTS . It is the sports car vehicle that has made waves in its class. It has dethroned the BF Weevil Custom to become the game's fastest vehicle with a whooping top speed of 138 mph. On next-gen consoles with HSW upgrades, it has become the first vehicle to reach over 170 mph.

This vehicle can slightly oversteer, but this is completely manageable. It is a beautiful vehicle, and comes with great customization options. For its price, Banshee GTS is an absolute steal and is the vehicle that players must buy from the latest DLC for GTA Online .

item.title: Fantasian Neo Dimension: True Dimengeon Side Quest
item.description:
After escaping jail with Ez and Uzra 's captain, players will make their way through the Valley on the Ancient Mountain Path to the Outskirts of Vibra Royal Capital . Here, they will come across Ez's workshop, where one of Ez's foster brothers will inquire about the Dimengeon machine players possess. This interaction triggers the True Dimengeon side quest, which involves several steps across different areas.

Completing this JRPG side quest requires a bit of exploration and interaction with various NPCs. This guide provides detailed instructions on how to complete the side quest and claim the rewards in Fantasian Neo Dimension .

True Dimengeon Side Quest In Fantasian Neo Dimension

After discussing the Dimengeon Machine with the boy, he will ask you to gather a few items for an upgrade. The first two are a Battery and a Magic Crystal , which can be obtained by defeating enemies or machines in earlier regions. Once you hand these over, he will request one more item, which fans of semi-open world JRPGs can find in the Vibra Royal Capital.

He provides you with a Deal Ticket to exchange for this item, but take note that the Circuit Board he mentions will vary for each player. In our case, it was Circuit Board SX .

Continue advancing through the main story and make your way to the Sewers, eventually reaching the Royal Capital. In the Town Centre, head left to find some kids who will direct you to an alleyway for the exchange. Speak with the man to obtain the Circuit Board. Once you have it, proceed with the main story until the Warp Device is functioning again. Once operational, Fast Travel to the Outskirts to complete the quest and upgrade your Dimengeon, increasing its maximum capacity to 40 .

You can return to the Outskirts by backtracking through the Sewers, even if your Warp Device is broken, though this will take a considerable amount of time and involve many enemy encounters along the way.

item.title: This Could Be Project Century's Lead Actor
item.description:
Summary

  • Project Century, set in 1915 Japan, features new character fighting in arcade-style beat-em-up action gameplay.
  • Character resembles Kazuma Kiryu's live-action actor from 2007.

Some fans have theorized and potentially narrowed down the lead actor for Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio's Project Century , believing the main character is modeled and portrayed by Kazuma Kiryu's live-action actor from the 2007 Like a Dragon film, Kazuki Kitamura. Project Century is an upcoming game by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio, best known for the Yakuza / Like a Dragon video game series. The developer is no stranger to producing new games outside the usual fare, with Project Century seeming to be one of the most diverse and gritty titles RGG Studio is working on.

Project Century was first revealed during The Game Awards 2024, catching the attention of fans fairly quickly. It is a period piece that takes place in 1915's Japan, focusing on a brand-new character as he explores a rural town. The trailer showed off how the player would be fighting against a number of mooks in the traditional arcade-like beat-em-up action gameplay style of the Kazuma Kiryu-led games, rather than the JRPG turn-based combat of the Ichiban Kasuga titles. Not only does the action look more realistic and gritty, but it's gotten fans theorizing about how or if this series is connected to the Like a Dragon universe. One seemingly apparent connection is the main character, who some fans believe is based on the live-action actor for Kazuma Kiryu in 2007's Like a Dragon .

As pointed out by Jack Yakuza and Ultra Oak on Twitter, the new protagonist looks extremely similar to Kazuki Kitamura, who portrayed Kazuma Kiryu in the 2007 Like a Dragon film adaptation. Many fans believe this is the case due to their incredibly distinct facial features, or at least the facial model is very similar to him. While many fans are divided on the quality of the film itself, many agree that the fight scenes with Kitamura were incredibly solid, especially when bouncing off Goro Kishitani as Goro Majima.

Kazuki Kitamura and His Work Outside the Like a Dragon Movie

Kazuki Kitamura's filmography, outside the aforementioned Like a Dragon film adaptation, was also in various live-action anime adaptations, such as 2023's Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead as Gonzo Kosugi, or the 2024 Golden Kamuy: Hokkaido Tattooed Prisoners Scramble Arc live-action drama as Shirosuke Inudo. Project Century potentially using a big name actor for its lead isn't anything new either, considering Japanese icon Takuya Kimura was the face model and actor for the main character of the Judgment spin-offs.

This casting decision hasn't been confirmed yet, as Project Century was only just revealed on December 12. Regardless, a lot of noise is being made about Project Century and its place in the Like a Dragon timeline, some fans believing it could be a prequel that takes place 100 years before the events of the mainline games. Fans will just need to wait for more official information from Sega and RGG Studio about Project Century .
